Description:
This is a 6-piece Genesis Collection knife block set with a wood and tempered glass block. Tempered glass is durable, cleans up easily, and allows for knife blades to be seen for quick selection. Attractive beech wood provides a elegant and modern look with a sleek, minimal foot print. Block only takes up 8" x 3  1/4" space on the counter. One piece, fully forged German steel knives for long lasting sharpness, and increased efficiency when cutting and chopping. Ergonomic Santorin handle offers superior comfort and a non-slip grip.

Wood and Tempered Glass Knife Holder
NSF Certified Genesis knife set features a streamlined knife holder with a compact 8 x 3 1/4 inch footprint. The Beechwood core is framed by tempered glass for a modern look that makes knife identification easy.

Ergonomic Design Precision Forged German Steel Blades
Handcrafted precision forged steel results in the highest quality blades, assures long lasting sharpness, and increases efficiency when cutting and chopping. Beautifully balanced bolster.

Non-slip Santoprene handles and full tang construction indicate premium quality and durability. Santoprene provides superior grip control whether your hands are wet or dry. It will not break down when exposed to kitchen oils and detergents, and is suitable for hot and cold conditions. Limited lifetime warranty.
Name: Mercer Culinary M20050 6-Pc. Genesis Knife Block Set - Beech Wood and Glass
